Package puzzle

Class Grid

java.lang.Object
puzzle.Grid
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Grid extends Object implements Serializable
this class is the grid containing cells with which the players will play
Author:
CYTech Student

    • isValidated

      public boolean isValidated(int i, int j)
      This method makes it possible to determine if the coordinates i and j are in the grid's play, that is to say that they are not outside the table or that they don't point to UnExistantCell true : Coordinates to check are valid (in grid's game) false : coordinates to check are not valid (out grid's game)
      Parameters:
      i - The coordinates to check
      j - The coordinates to check
      Returns:
      true : Coordinates to check are valid (in grid's game) false : coordinates to check are not valid (out grid's game)

      public boolean moveCell(Cell C1, Cell C2)
      This method moves a cell of the grid towards a direction while checking if that is possible

      C2 -
      Returns:
      true : The cell has been moved false : The cell has not been moved (because it can't)
